title.rendered: Digiperform Launches Its 35th Centre In Kanpur

content.rendered:
Digiperform’s 35th center in Kanpur

Digiperform is ready to deliver digital marketing skills to the people of Kanpur by launching its 35th center on 4th Dec’18, in Phoolbagh, Mall Road, Kanpur. The launch was followed by a great ceremony under the presence of Digiperform Kanpur Partner – Mr. Balraj Singh. On this auspicious occasion, Mr. Singh quoted that “Everyone has talent, capabilities, and liberty to grow. At Digiperform we will help them to expand knowledge, find passion and most importantly explore their career paths.” Digiperform is very excited to share that we have launched 2 centers in India (Kanpur and Kochi) within the same week, back to back; and geared up to impart Knowledge & proficiency through our Skilled based digital marketing training program to everyone.

ABOUT DIGIPERFORM:

Digiperform is India’s Most Trusted Brand in Digital Education that believed in aiming to impart digital marketing skills to a million people. The motive is to help them to achieve the best in their business as well as career. We provide 2 certification training programs (dCDME & dCDMC) with a different set of modules to fresh graduates, working professionals, and wannabe entrepreneurs, enabling them to be self-employed, get placed in top organizations & understand the operation of Digital Marketing to run their own empires. Other than these there are multiple certifications that are offered by different ad tools and platforms that can be added to CVs. The major includes Google Adwords & Analytics Certifications, Bing Ads, Facebook Blueprint Certifications and Multiple Content & Inbound Marketing Certifications offered by Hubspot. It focuses on delivering high valued digital marketing curriculum to masses through its learning management system and classroom training facilities.

DIGIPERFORM HIGHLIGHTS:

Digiperform is India’s fastest growing Digital Marketing Training Company born under astounding duos; Manu Jolly, a serial entrepreneur, and Vaibhav Vats, a digital marketing savant. In the past 3 years, Digiperform has been acknowledged by various achievements such as:
  • Awarded as the “Most Trusted Brand in Digital Education 2017” by WCRC Leaders Asia (Leading Marketing Research Firm and Magazine for Asian Leaders) held in New Delhi.
  • Awarded as “India’s Most Promising Brand 2017” in Education sector by WCRC Leaders Asia out of Top 50 Indian Companies under numerous categories in 5th Asian Brands & Leadership Summit held in Bangkok, Thailand.
  • Digiperform awarded in Gold Category status by WCRC for recently launched Digital Marketing Executive Curriculum, Certifications and LMS developed for Digital Marketing Trainings.
  • This Award Winning LMS includes all the required study material as a private feature available for registered students 24X7.
  • 15000+ students already trained in over 250+ batches.
